text: Rockdale is a village in Illinois. In 2020, it had a population of 2,012. ==Location== Rockdale is south of Joliet, and southwest of Chicago. ==Emergency service== The village's fire suppression services are operated by the Rockdale Fire Protection district. EMS is provided by Daley's Ambulance, and law enforcement by Rockdale Police. ==References== Category:Towns in Illinois
title: Rockdale, Illinois
